props.items: Data source. Due to the virtualization feature of the MSwiper component, all data must be provided at once and cannot be updated incrementally.
props.height: Height of the video area, default is 100vh.
props.width: Width of the video area, default is 100%.
props.defaultAutoplayNext: Whether to autoplay the next video by default.
props.autoplay: Whether to autoplay the current video.
props.rotateFullscreen: Whether to automatically rotate in fullscreen mode, commonly used for landscape effects on mobile devices.

events.OnFullscreen: Triggered when the fullscreen state changes, with parameters for the current video and fullscreen status.
events.OnDownload: Triggered when the download button is clicked, with parameters for the current video item.

contents.sideActionsContent: Custom content slot for right-side action buttons.
contents.topContent: Custom content slot for the top area, can be used to display video title, subtitles, etc.
contents.bottomContent: Custom content slot for the bottom area, can be used to display video title, subtitles, etc.
contents.bottomActionsContent: Custom content slot for the bottom action bar, supports custom MListItem components.
